name: The Gift of Time (vector8)
description:
A simple puzzle escape-room-esque game in which you wake up in a dark decrepit room, with the power to take time into your own hands, literally. To whom do you owe this gift? Time is not easily given, yet is easily spent. Use it well, for time is fleeting.

This was a game jam game submitted to GDJam 19 (https://itch.io/jam/gdjam-19). Original submission link: https://shinikii.itch.io/the-gift-of-time.
